verses.text: My \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, why hast thou \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me? \add why art thou so\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from \w helping|strong="H3444"\w* me, \add and from\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of my \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w*?\f + \fr 22.1 \ft Aijeleth…: or, the hind of the morning\f*\f + \fr 22.1 \ft helping…: Heb. my salvation\f*

O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w*, but thou \w hearest|strong="H6030"\w* not; and in the night \w season|strong="H3915"\w*, and am not \w silent|strong="H1747"\w*.\f + \fr 22.2 \ft am…: Heb. there is no silence to me\f*
But thou \add art\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \add O thou\add* that \w inhabitest|strong="H3427"\w* the \w praises|strong="H8416"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
Our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in thee: they \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w*, and thou didst \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* them.
They \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto thee, and were \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*: they \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in thee, and were not \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*.

But I \add am\add* a \w worm|strong="H8438"\w*, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, and \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

All they that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* me laugh me to \w scorn|strong="H3932"\w*: they shoot \w out|strong="H6358"\w* the \w lip|strong="H8193"\w*, they \w shake|strong="H5128"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \add saying\add*,\f + \fr 22.7 \ft shoot…: Heb. open\f*

He \w trusted|strong="H1556"\w* on the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add that\add* he would \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* him: let him \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* him, seeing he \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* in him.\f + \fr 22.8 \ft He trusted…: Heb. He rolled himself on\f*\f + \fr 22.8 \ft seeing…: or, if he delight in\f*

But thou \add art\add* he that \w took|strong="H1518"\w* me out of the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: thou didst make me \w hope|strong="H0982"\w* \add when I was\add* upon my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft didst…: or, kept me in safety\f*
I was \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* upon thee from the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*: thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0410"\w* from my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.

Be not \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me; for \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*; for \add there is\add* none to \w help|strong="H5826"\w*.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft none…: Heb. not a helper\f*

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* have \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* me: \w strong|strong="H0047"\w* \add bulls\add* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* have beset me \w round|strong="H3803"\w*.

They \w gaped|strong="H6475"\w* upon me \add with\add* their \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w*, \add as\add* a \w ravening|strong="H2963"\w* and a \w roaring|strong="H7580"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*.\f + \fr 22.13 \ft gaped…: Heb. opened their mouths against me\f*

I am poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* like \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and all my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are out of \w joint|strong="H6504"\w*: my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is like \w wax|strong="H1749"\w*; it is \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft out of…: or, sundered\f*

My \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* is dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* like a \w potsherd|strong="H2789"\w*; and my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1692"\w* to my \w jaws|strong="H4455"\w*; and thou hast \w brought|strong="H8239"\w* me into the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

For \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* have \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* me: the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w* have \w inclosed|strong="H5362"\w* me: they \w pierced|strong="H3738"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* and my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.
I may \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* all my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*: they \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \add and\add* \w stare|strong="H7200"\w* upon me.
They \w part|strong="H2505"\w* my \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* among them, and \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* upon my \w vesture|strong="H3830"\w*.
But be not thou \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: O my \w strength|strong="H0360"\w*, \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* thee to \w help|strong="H5833"\w* me.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; my \w darling|strong="H3173"\w* from the \w power|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*.\f + \fr 22.20 \ft my darling: Heb. my only one\f*\f + \fr 22.20 \ft power: Heb. hand\f*

\w Save|strong="H3467"\w* me from the \w lion’s|strong="H0738"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for thou hast \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me from the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w unicorns|strong="H7214"\w*.

I will \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* unto my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* will I \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thee.

Ye that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* him; all ye the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* him; and \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* him, all ye the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For he hath not \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* nor \w abhorred|strong="H8262"\w* the \w affliction|strong="H6039"\w* of the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w*; neither hath he \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from him; but when he \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* unto him, he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

My \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \add shall be\add* of thee in the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*: I will \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* before them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him.

The \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: they shall \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* him: your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

All the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w world|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and all the \w kindreds|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.
For the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and he \add is\add* the \w governor|strong="H4910"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

All \add they that be\add* \w fat|strong="H1879"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*: all they that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* shall \w bow|strong="H3766"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: and none can keep \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
A \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him; it shall be \w accounted|strong="H5608"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* for a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

They shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* unto a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that shall be \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add this\add*.
